translations.translation: The shaytans did not bring it down.
The devils did not bring it down:
The satans did not bring down this (Clear Book),
The satans have not revealed the Quran;
And this Qur’an was not brought down by the devils.
And it is not the Shayatin (devils) who have brought it down.
And the Shaitans have not come down with it.
Not by the Satans has it been brought down;
The devils did not bring it down.
It was not the devils who brought down the Quran:
And the satans have not brought it down.
It has not been brought down by the devils.
No evil ones have brought down this (Revelation):
And it is not the Shayatin (devils) who have brought it (this Quran) down,
It was not the satans who brought it down:
It was not the devils that revealed it.
And the devils have not brought the revelation down.
[26:210] It, the Qur’ān, has not been brought down by the devils.
(The devils) at the time of the Prophet (pbuh) (did not bring it down) did not bring the Qur'an down.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
رد الله عليهم بقوله: { مَا تَنَزَّلَتْ بِهِ } أي: بالقرآن الفرقان
 المعجز لفظاً ومعنى
 المبني على الهداية المحصنة { ٱلشَّيَاطِينُ } [الشعراء: 210] الضالون المضلون
 إذ لا يتأتى منهم الهداية أصلاً


{ وَمَا يَنبَغِي لَهُمْ } الإتيان بالهداية والرشاد { وَمَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ } [الشعراء: 211] ويقدرون عليها
 إذ الهداية إنما هي من طيب النفس وطهارة الفطرة
 وأمَّا استماعهم وسماعهم من الملائكة أيضاً لا يتأتى منهم
 ولا يمكنهم
